Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Amphipathic peptide Hj0164 (Non-disulfide bridged protein family 5, NDBP-5; Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.PTM: C-terminal amidation and Cleavage on pair of basic residues.
Sequence Information.Function: Amphipathic peptide that shows antibacterial acitivities.

Literature.Title: The tale of a resting gland transcriptome of a replete venom gland from the scorpion Hottentotta judaicus.
